txt.en: You should search the cave at Lithengris for the source of the corpse's injuries.
You've found a dead Corsair at Lithengris.
You have found another Corsair corpse in the cave at Lithengris that bears similar injuries to the other's.\n\nYou should examine this second corpse.
You have defeated a giant crab in the caves of Lithengris.
You have defeated a giant crab in the caves of Lithengris. It seems to have been the only crustacean of its size living here... at least, you hope so.
This corpse bears injuries similar to the other's

This Corsair's body bears grievous injuries. It's doubtful that the crabs you've seen thus far could have caused such damage.\n\nMarks in the sand indicate that the Corsair dragged himself out of the nearby cave before dying. Perhaps delving deeper will offer some answers.
A giant crab emerges to attack you!
